description: This file contains configuration utilities for a FastAPI backend, including functions to load environment variables, parse environment variables, and assemble application settings such as database URLs, JWT secrets, and server ports.

methods.name: str get_env(name: str, default: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable by name, raising an error if missing and no default is provided.

methods.name: List[str] _parse_origins(csv: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of origins into a list of trimmed strings.

methods.name: dict get_settings()
methods.description: Collects and returns application configuration settings from environment variables, applying default values and type conversions.

ctags.name: get_env
ctags.pattern: /^def get_env(name: str, default: Optional[str] = None) -> str:$/
